channel.title: Comments on: OMG, They Killed Kalimdor!

item.title: By: Saccia
item.dc:creator: Saccia
item.description: You are obviously from the part of the world that has been brainwashed by the soft drink known as Pepsi (as I sip on my rather tasty Coca-Cola).
item.content:encoded: You are obviously from the part of the world that has been brainwashed by the soft drink known as Pepsi (as I sip on my rather tasty Coca-Cola).

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: I can neither confirm nor deny that there are moles or whacking involved in this other thing that I can't talk about. I can tell you that there's Pepsi, and by that I mean I was enjoying a Pepsi at the time which greatly enhanced my experience, but not so much that it overshadowed the experience, mind you. It was just the right melange of soft drink and activity.
item.content:encoded: I can neither confirm nor deny that there are moles or whacking involved in this other thing that I can’t talk about. I can tell you that there’s Pepsi, and by that I mean I was enjoying a Pepsi at the time which greatly enhanced my experience, but not so much that it overshadowed the experience, mind you. It was just the right melange of soft drink and activity.

item.title: By: drypulse
item.dc:creator: drypulse
item.description: i've heard that its like playing whack-a-mole... so tell me this, is that other thing you do funner then whack-a-mole? i'm hoping it is.
item.content:encoded: i’ve heard that its like playing whack-a-mole… so tell me this, is that other thing you do funner then whack-a-mole? i’m hoping it is.
